    public interface IGatewayFctRPCBase
    Interface 'GatewayFct' between Client / Gateway Created by regis on 10/07/2017.

      • subscribe

        boolean subscribe(java.lang.String opcServer,
                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> lstItemPath,
                  int rate)
        Subscribe a list of OPC item
        Parameters:
        opcServer - Name of the OPC server (declare in gateway)
        lstItemPath - List of OPC item
        rate - Frequency OPC update subscription
        Returns:
        True if the subscription is open
